Entries.default: This aurochs skull is tightly affixed to these wooden planks.
Something stirs beneath the boards, and your attention shifts to the northern wall at the sound of a hidden mechanism realigning.
Your finger brushes a small switch hidden within the left eye socket.
You can barely make out a small lever tucked within the recesses of the skull's left eye.
The skull seems pretty well-attached. Nails have been driven through the back of it into the wood.
